message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $115. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $127. This is as close as I can get to your target price, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $127. I'd be willing to pay $122 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $122. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $128. This is as close as I can get to your target price, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $128. I'd be willing to pay $129 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
